data.message: what is procedure of  photo hidden ??

replies.message: Hi چوہدری. To learn how to hide or delete a post from your Page, please visit our Help Center here: https://www.facebook.com/help/252986458110193. Keep in mind that if a post you've hidden was shared, it may still be visible to the audience it was shared with other places on Facebook, such as in News Feed and search. Also, photos you've hidden from your Page's Timeline will still be visible when people visit your Page's Photos section. -Hailey
